Package de.elo.ix.client

Class JobState

java.lang.Object
byps.BValueClass
de.elo.ix.client.ValueClass
de.elo.ix.client.JobState
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class JobState
extends ValueClass
implements java.io.Serializable
Objects of this class provide information on the state of any background processes.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Organisation: ELO Digital Office GmbH

See Also:
Serialized Form

    When the information expires (milliseconds): (jobEnd + expires < current-date).

    End or termination of the job.
    protected java.lang.String jobGuid
    Job identifier.

    Thread name.

    Set to true while the job is being executed.

    Start of job.
    protected java.lang.String lastGuid
    Status information for GUIDs.
    protected int lastID
    Status information for integer IDs.
    protected ProcessInfo procInfo
    The standard process-by-SORD job list.
    protected java.lang.String strMsg
    Job-defined message string.
